imdb.plot outline: "The NEST Files" is a public access TV show, based on the New England Spiritual Team. They are a group of paranormal and historical investigators and researchers. They travel throughout the New England region, searching for claims of haunted locations, while researching, exploring, and investigating them to either back up the claims or correct any mistakes in history. They also like to interview local groups in the field, thus to learn from them and also get the chance to work alongside those groups, too.
imdb.title: The NEST Files
plot: "_The NEST Files_ (qv)" is a public access TV show, based on the New England Spiritual Team. They are a group of paranormal and historical investigators and researchers. They travel throughout the New England region, searching for claims of haunted locations, while researching, exploring, and investigating them to either back up the claims or correct any mistakes in history. They also like to interview local groups in the field, thus to learn from them and also get the chance to work alongside those groups, too.::Michael Carroll
